org.cloudbus.cloudsim.resources

Class RawStorage

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cloudbus.cloudsim.resources.AbstractResource<Long>
      • org.cloudbus.cloudsim.resources.RawStorage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Resource<Long>, ResourceCapacity<Long>, ResourceManageable<Long>

    public final class RawStorage
extends AbstractResource<Long>
    A simple storage that just manages the device capacity and raw allocated (used) space. It doesn't deals with files neither with file system operations such as file inclusion or deletion.
    Author:
    Manoel Campos da Silva Filho
